channel.title: Art of Photography on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Art of Photography on Rusland 1

item.title: Foto: Alexey Titarenko
item.description: Sint-Petersburg â€˜Major photo series include “City of Shadows” (1992-1994), “Black and White Magic of St. Petersburg” (1995-1997), and “Time Standing Still” (1998-1999). In those series Titarenko paints a bitter picture of a Russia (seen through the lens of St. Petersburg), where people live in a world of unrealized hopes and where time seems to have stopped.
